items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit well
items.body: I gave it a 10 out of 10. I used to mu son wedding and I had a lot of compliments. The material is elastic so fit very well. Y9u can choose to show your shoulders if you don't want to show shoulders still looks very pretty. For context I weigh 125 and I got a medium. Read more
items.author: jahaira vazquez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love you this dress
items.body: Absolutely love this dress! It’s comfortable and stays in place. Fits great! Read more
items.author: HashC

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars CHUNKY GLITTER meets cocktail dress
items.body: 3 stars from your average 'bit of shimmer' dress wearer like me, but 5 stars if you like chunky glittered material. Beauty is in the eye of the beholder, but do understand this dress is FULL of shiny flecks. Love the overall design, but... this ain't no ordinary sparkle - lol! Read more
items.author: Shopper Lady

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress
items.body: I'm 60+, 5'7" weight 130, I've never had a waistline to speak of but have ample bustline. I saw this dress and fell in love with the color. For years it was almost impossible to find any clothing in brown-now it seem to be the "in color" this year. As soon as it was delivered I tried it on-my plan is to wear it to a wedding in Oct. I love the sleeves they can be worn down or rouched to the elbow. They aren't scratchy at all. The rouching around the chest/shoulders is flattering but you have to fuss with it to to get it just so. It has a side zipper at the waistline too. II love the lightweight fabric which has a lining sewn in. I'm taller so where it hit my knees is perfect - might be problematic for a shorter girl. The only issue I have is it doesn't have rhinestones as it appeared to me in the stock photo. It's actually glitter like and despite shaking the dress out-the glitter still falls off. I'm 85% I'll keep it-I'll be shaking it out again before I make up my mine, Read more
items.author: MizunderstoodFL

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wounderfull dress!!!
items.body: The best dress perfect I used in thanksgiving is perfect quality, I very recommend for party, events, color brown is one dress delicate for one woman roar !!! I love is product ❤️❤️❤️ Read more
items.author: Claudia Wes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the feel and look
items.body: Love this dress, very flattering no matter what size you are. I really needed a large but I'm keeping it to fit into it next year. Read more
items.author: Libby Porterfield

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Off Shoulder Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Off Shoulder Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Darkgreen, Red, Brown, Navy, Purple, Burgundy, Black, Grayish Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
